sentences.en: He could hit his target one hundred times without a single miss.
sentences.cn: 他打靶能百发百中.

sentences.en: He missed the target only once yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天他只有一次脱靶.

sentences.en: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentences.cn: 我干脆利落地击球，命中了目标。

sentences.en: In the past they have been the target of racist abuse.
sentences.cn: 过去，他们一直是种族虐待的对象。

sentences.en: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.cn: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

sentences.en: observations that were right on target.
sentences.cn: 一针见血切中要害的话

sentences.en: Robertson is not far off her target.
sentences.cn: 罗伯逊离她的目标不远了。

sentences.en: She was a prime target for blackmail, don't you see?
sentences.cn: 她是敲诈的主要目标。你难道看不出来吗？

sentences.en: The advertisement was designed to target a mass audience.
sentences.cn: 这个广告是针对大众的。

sentences.en: The area is used by the army for target practice .
sentences.cn: 这个地方被军队用来练习打靶。

sentences.en: The area is used by the army for target practice.
sentences.cn: 这个地方被军队用来练习打靶。

sentences.en: The bullet missed its intended target.
sentences.cn: 子弹未击中预定的目标。

sentences.en: The country is a target of criticism for its human rights record.
sentences.cn: 该国因其人权记录而成为批评的对象。

sentences.en: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.cn: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.en: The guidance systems didn't work and the missile couldn't hit its target.
sentences.cn: 导航系统失灵，导弹未能命中目标。

sentences.en: The professor has been a frequent target for animal rights extremists.
sentences.cn: 那位教授屡屡受到极端动物保护主义者的抨击。

sentences.en: The programme is targeted at improving the health of women of all ages.
sentences.cn: 该计划的目的是提高各年龄层妇女的健康水平。

sentences.en: Their arrows are dead on target.
sentences.cn: 他们的箭正中靶心。

sentences.en: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.cn: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.en: They know they are a sitting target for the press.
sentences.cn: 他们知道自己很容易受到媒体的攻击。

sentences.en: They were still 91 short of their target.
sentences.cn: 他们离目标还差91。

sentences.en: We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.
sentences.cn: 我们须针对我们的听众对象，即年龄在20到30岁之间的妇女。

sentences.en: We were still right on target for our deadline.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然有可能赶在最后期限前达成目标。

sentences.en: Yuppies are a prime target group for marketing strategies.
sentences.cn: 雅皮士是市场营销策略面向的主要目标群体。

sentences.en: 英文例句:The country is a target of criticism for its human rights record.
sentences.cn: 该国因其人权记录而成为批评的对象。

phrases.tran_cn: 击中要害的，准确的：完全准确的、精确的或有效的
目标受众；目标观众；目标客户
目标检测；目标探测；目标觉察
目的语；目标语言；译入语
n. 目标位置，目标定位；目标搜索

trans.tran_en: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time

trans.tran_cn: 以…为攻击目标，瞄准，面向
trans.tran_en: to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area
something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area
